query:
SELECT * 
FROM   wp_db.vbuffer_contents a 
WHERE  pack_id = '' -- <------------ Insertar aqui el numero de PACKID a consultar
       AND status = 'B' 
       AND pack_id = (SELECT pack_id 
                      FROM   wp_db.kardex 
                      WHERE  state = 'C' 
                             AND pack_id = a.pack_id 
                             AND delevered_to IS NOT NULL) 
       AND osa_id NOT IN(SELECT laser 
                         FROM   ilm.bond 
                         UNION ALL 
                         SELECT laser 
                         FROM   ilm.master) 
ORDER  BY position
